results.title: High Dose of Metformin Decreases Susceptibility to Occlusive Arterial Thrombosis in Diabetic Mice
results.text_hl: The novelty of our studies shows promising antiplatelet effects of commonly used preclinical dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002341 @@@arterial thrombosis@@@.
